thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: connie

author: connie
title: connie
text:
I ordered on the 15th, I paid extra for expedited shipping, they immediately printed the shipping label but the package was not shipped until the 20th. (Just because you get notice the shipping label has been printed means nothing)
As of the 27th I still have not received. They market Superfast shipping and then I pay for even faster.... laughable! When customer service was notified, just flower talk and no results, they had lots of excuses but nothing was done. WORST EXPERIENCE I"VE EVER HAD ON LINE. If you are disabled and need supplements, AVOID THIS store which is "Full Circle dba as PURE FORMULAS! Absolutely Terrible Experience.
